definitions.definition: The act of truncating or shortening (for example, words are shortened to form blend words or portmanteaus ).
The removal of the least significant digits from a decimal number .
An operation in any dimension that cuts a regular polytope at its vertices , creating a new facet in place of each vertex.

main_definition: ( linguistics ) The act of truncating or shortening (for example, words are shortened to form blend words or portmanteaus ).
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) The removal of the least significant digits from a decimal number .
( geometry ) An operation in any dimension that cuts a regular polytope at its vertices , creating a new facet in place of each vertex.
